metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11531 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the WriteHISTOGRAMImage() function in coders/histogram.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0084-CVE-2017-11531-Memory-Leak-in-WriteHISTOGRAMImage-co.patch in unstable 0247-CVE-2017-11531-Fix-histogram-memory-leak.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
